location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain Hardy, Commanding the HC Cruizer Teignmouth, Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter requests that the HC Cruizer Teignmouthproceed to Muscat to deliver a package to the Native Agent, who will forward it to Bombay. Hardy is informed that he will be given further instructions by the Senior Officer of the squadron at Manoo Bay [MangÅ«] or Muscat.
